text: Totally spoofing Beyonce ’ s epic pregnancy pic, Meghan Edmonds, who ’ s also expecting twins, made a bold statement! See her, dare we say equally as gorgeous, copy - cat pic! If imitation is the highest form of flattery, Beyonce, 36, should be VERY proud! After all, Real Housewives of Orange County star, Meghan King Edmonds, 33, completely copied the singer ’ s internet - breaking pregnancy announcement pic from 2017 … and she kind of nailed it! While we ’ ve seen a few spoofs since Bey ’ s original hit Instagram last year, Meghan ’ s is definitely our favorite — her attention to detail is impeccable! The best part? Meghan is ALSO expecting twins
